PERSONA:
john is a 68-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region of the united states, specifically in the middle atlantic division. he is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and identifies as a protestant, born-again or evangelical christian, though he seldom attends religious services.

politically, john considers himself an independent voter, but he leans towards the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative views. despite having a lower income of less than $30,000 per year, he is absolutely certain that he is registered to vote at his current address.

john was born in the united states and is a citizen. he does not have any hispanic or latino origins. while he has not been actively involved in volunteerism, john enjoys keeping up with current events and stays informed through various sources, including the internet.

overall, john is a retired or semi-retired individual who values his faith, maintains a moderate political stance, and remains engaged in civic duties such as voting, despite his financial constraints.
